name: Timaeus
description:
Comes with 2 Transmutation Materials when played. If your deck originally includes at least 6 Artifact cards, you will randomly also draw 1 Artifact Card from your deck.
End Phase: This card will gain 1 Transmutation Material.
When playing an Artifact Card: If possible, spend Transmutation Materials equal to the total cost of the Artifact and equip this Artifact for free. (Once per Round)

storytext: "Hello there... Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."
source: Reward for accepting Timaeus' Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
